title: Grand_Theft_Auto_V [FitGirl Ultra Repack 2.1]
description:
Repack Features

Based on Grand.Theft.Auto.V-RELOADED ISO release: rld-gtav.iso (63,383,863,296 bytes)
Grand.Theft.Auto.V.Update.v1.36.Incl.Money.Trainer-RELOADED patch (7.8 GB) installed over
Game version is v1.0.877.1/v1.36 Online
This version needs no Rockstar Social Club installed no more
“Returning Players Exclusive Content AND RGSC Sign-in Extras Unlocker – Saved game” can be found in game root after installation. Copy files from it to your save folder to unlock exclusive content
Edit “FixedCash” string in “socialclub.ini” to change money for your game chars
Two trainers (Native & Simple 4.2) added to “Trainers” folder, use them to spawn DLC vehicles or for other fun stuff
100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded – ALL MULTIPLAYER & DLC FILES are totally intact, repack is safe for modding
Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 66.8 to 35.2 GB)
ATTENTION! This repack creates some load on your HDD. So if you’re installing the game not on SSD, please turn off any torrent client you have & disable any on-the-fly antivirus, so the installation could go faster. Otherwise blame yourself for a long installation
Installation takes: ~1.5 hours on 8-cores CPUs + HDD; ~2 hours on 4-cores CPU + HDD; ; ~3-3.5 hours on 2-cores CPU + HDD. Installing on SSD is faster for ~0.5-1.5 hours
After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
HDD space after installation: 68 GB (~69 GB during installation of repack)
Use “Language Selector.exe” in game root to select the game GUI language
Repack uses pZlib library by Razor12911
At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
